title: After NCLT's nod, IDFC-IDFC First Bank merger to be effective October 1
description: The National Company Law Tribunal has approved the merger of IDFC FHCL with IDFC Limited, effective September 30, and the subsequent merger of IDFC Limited with IDFC FIRST Bank from October 1. The Reserve Bank of India had already given its nod for this reverse merger in December 2023.
